meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gamestates

Class GameStateGameOver

  • java.lang.Object
    • meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gamestates.GameStateMachine
      • meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gamestates.GameStateGameOver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class GameStateGameOver
extends GameStateMachine
    Game Over state. Will be shown to the player after there will be game over.
    Author:
    vpyyhtia

        Update controller with deltaTime

      • skip

        public void skip()
        Skip from Game Over state. Goes to the High scores if player has enough points. Also exits from Game Over state.

      • retry

        public void retry()
        Retry current level.
